transcription: God, we just thank you Lord for this beautiful day. God, I thank you for the privilege that you've given me to spend time with Joelle and Jen. So God, whatever we do today, whatever is said and done, we pray Lord that it would bless you. Jen, one of the first things I noticed about you, other than your Chinese accent, was your wisdom and maturity. The wisdom that the Bible calls us to ask for, I saw that in you. And I promise to lead you only once God leads me. Well and Jen, by the power vested in me in the state of Texas, and as a minister of the gospel, I now pronounce you husband and wife.
